participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and humorous, he has a playful side and enjoys sharing fun facts about himself.
participant_1.background: i read twenty books a year. i'm a stunt double as my second job. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i was raised in a single parent household.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Caring and creative, she has a passion for helping others and enjoys expressing herself through music.
participant_2.background: i spent a decade working in the human services field. my father used to work for home depot. i've a son who is in junior high school. horror movies are my favorites.
